author: gabriele
msg: renaming to final 0.3.0 tag after successful release

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-3434] Spring and blueprint can use the same schema for coloc as it
doesn't need to reference the bean namespace

author: dkulp
msg: corba tooling just needs the antlr runtime part, not the full set of
Added support to the STSTokenValidator to validate UsernameTokens to the STS.
Don't put a version on the opensaml dep yet as it's not yet an OSGi
bundle and I'm not sure what version they'll use.
CXF-3419 Removed most of the osgi transport code
[CXF-3423] Better support for WADL doc extensions

CXF-3419 Created new HttpTransportFactory that replaces http client only, http jetty, http osgi and http servlet transport. Some broken jaxrs tests remain and the destinationRegistry is not yet correctly pulled in osgi
CXF-3425 CXF bundles of 2.4-SNAPSHOT should not import the package of org.w3._2001.xmlschema
CXF-3425 revert the patch, as it is not needed.
Try to fixed the build error with the JDK 15
Added a STSSamlAssertionValidator, which does not throw an exception if signature trust verification fails.
- This validator is used by the STSTokenValidator. If trust verification fails, then the token is dispatched to the STS for verification.
CXF-3419 Fixes for jaxrs test failures
CXF-3419 Fix for http osgi setup using spring-dm
Adding the ability to set the KeyType directly on the STSClient.
CXF-3419 Fix to make context loading possible from classpath and from servlet context
Fixed a bug with the previous WS-Trust KeyType commit + added support for sending OnBehalfOf elements.
CXF-3419 Adding CXFNonSpringServlet to make it possible again to run cxf without spring at runtime
Start porting Johan Edstom's blueprint stuff onto trunk
Add configuration stuff into blueprint bus
- Add inbound support for enforcing SAML SupportingTokens.
Added the ability to configure a validator for BinarySecurityTokens
CXF-3419 Fixing osgi config for http, removing http-osgi project
[CXF-3338] Improving the way multiple namespaces and prefixes are handled in InTransformReader
Updating JAX-RS SourceProvider to work with readers available on the message
Get jaxws:server and simple:server elements working in blueprint
Fixing compilation failure to do with IOException having no constructor accepting Throwable in 1.5
Added support to the STSClient to extract a SecurityToken via the validate binding.
Updating the pom of the logbrowser demo
- Add support for adding a SAML Assertion to an outbound security header via a WS-SecurityPolicy SamlToken expression and a SAML CallbackHandler
- Added some systests for sending and receiving SAML Assertions over TLS and controlled by WS-SecurityPolicy
Get the features file somewhat closer to actually being usable
Allow the blueprint bus to lookup bus extensions from the OSGi registry
Grab the DestinationRegistry from the OSGi registry via above mechanism
Add a type converter at parse time as Aries cannot handle the
List<Interceptor<? extends Message> thing that we do.

msg: TAP5-73: Remove unnecessary logic for tracking "virtual libraries", a hold-over from how Tapestry 5.1 handle JavaScript aggregation
